search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for OpenPhone (openphone.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for OpenPhone is: [https://www.openphone.com/pricing](https://www.openphone.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: OpenPhone Pricing | Get started with a Free Trial

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: open phone logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6384ff50fe6feee653bfd044_openphone-logo.svg)](https://www.openphone.com/)

Start your free trial
---------------------

Try OpenPhone risk-free for 7 days. Cancel anytime (we’ll even remind you).

##### Starter

The essentials to get you and your team up and running

$

19
--

Per user/per month

![Image 173: A man wearing glasses and a black jacket smiling.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/65402345d8a574111415920f_person.webp)

##### “I wish I had a service like this 10 years ago! Just a piece of advice. I used my personal cell number as the company number and I still regret it a decade later (I get so many stupid calls). Don’t do what I did.”

**Michael Seibel** CEO at Y Combinator

![Image 174: The YCombinator brand logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/63c76bd08e1d2ca6beb53dc9_Customer%3DYCombinator.svg)

How does it work?

![Image 175: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

OpenPhone uses Internet to provide you with additional phone numbers on top of your existing devices. Download OpenPhone on your mobile or use it on the web to make and receive calls and messages.

What devices do you support?

![Image 176: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

OpenPhone works on mobile (iOS and Android) and desktop.

Does OpenPhone use my phone plan’s minutes?

![Image 177: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

No. OpenPhone uses your Internet connection - wifi or data. This allows you to use the service anywhere in the world.

How good is the call quality?

![Image 178: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

On a strong Internet connection you’ll have great call quality, even better than your carrier. We offer a free trial so you can try it and see for yourself.

What countries can I call and text?

![Image 179: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

Virtually any country in the world. Calling and texting US & Canadian numbers is included. For other countries, there is a per minute or per message rate based on the destination.

Can I use OpenPhone with my team?

![Image 180: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

Yes. See pricing section above for details around features available to companies and teams.

Can I distinguish between business and personal calls?

![Image 181: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

Yes. OpenPhone calls show up differently so you’ll be able to know when you get business calls.

What if I want to cancel my subscription?

![Image 182: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

Unlike our competitors, we won’t make you call us just to cancel your subscription. You can easily cancel your subscription at any time through the OpenPhone app in just a few clicks.

If you cancel your subscription, it will remain fully active until the end of your current billing cycle. After that, all numbers will be saved for 60 days before being removed from your workspace. During this period, you and everyone in your workspace will no longer be able to make calls or messages, but you will still have access to existing conversations and workspace data in case you still need it.

What number will my customers see when I call?

![Image 183: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

Your OpenPhone number. Your personal phone number stays private.

Can I use my OpenPhone number to receive two factor authentication (2FA) codes?

![Image 184: down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/6399db24482f87fb68c031e6_down.svg)

In many cases, services that use 2-factor authentication (2FA) don't allow virtual phone numbers to be used during the registration/verification step. We recommend using your personal phone number for registering new accounts and OpenPhone for all other purposes as you see fit.

The best business phone as rated by modern teams
------------------------------------------------

With an average 4.8 stars with over 1,100 reviews, it’s no surprise OpenPhone consistently wins G2's top awards for product quality and customer satisfaction.

Rated the best business phone
